html: 5.19.17  4:06 pm   How do you have time to answer all of these questions?

5.19.17  3:57 pm   What do people plan?

     what they're gonna do in the future, i suppose

5.19.17  3:38 pm   How long did it take to make "The entire history of the world, i guess" video? was it for collage or just for YouTube?

     it was to be viewed, by other people. such as fans, or perhaps others

5.19.17  3:16 pm   do you believe in life?

     oh hell yeah
5.19.17  3:00 pm   what are you gonna do now after history of the entire world? i guess
5.19.17  2:51 pm   Tits or ass?
5.19.17  1:53 pm   are you a male or female?

5.19.17  1:51 pm   Why is the universe so random?

     it's not really random. it's everything all at once. and at different times as well

5.19.17  1:50 pm   Do you like the rain?

     oh hell yeah

5.19.17  1:40 pm   I've been wondering, why are some of your videos only 8 seconds long?

     starting with short projects is a good way to get started if you are feeling overwhelmed with the possibilities. i did that for a while, and then just when i was ready to move on, i accidentally got really popular on a video site that has a maximum time length of 6 and a half seconds, so i had to make even more short ones

5.19.17  1:16 pm   what did the "currently vacationing in antarctica" phrase on the "expert mode" page mean?

     going off the 5-day schedule and trying to find ways to record all my songs in my life time

5.19.17  1:14 pm   Are you going to be uploading more often now that hotewig is done?

     i always complete projects as quickly as possible, and post them when they are done. i am doing it as fast as i can, and have been for several years now. i'm not sure if that answers your question
5.19.17  1:08 pm   What is your favorite meme ever

5.19.17  11:42 am   is time an illusion

     if it is, then everything is an illusion, in which case we should probably have a simpler word than illusion for what everything is, perhaps not even use a word at all

5.19.17  11:39 am   Bill, have ever thought of getting to 1 million subs?

     i would consider it

5.19.17  11:10 am   If you had to learn one language wht would it be?

     whichever one is most widely spoken where i live, and/or do business

5.19.17  10:40 am   Seriously though, why focus on hyperlinking and reanswering repetitive questions instead of solely focussing on answering those that haven't been asked before?

     all the questions have been asked before. and if i didn't share this experience, then i would be the only one who knows how many times i get asked these questions and would probably go insane. whoops already did

5.19.17  10:34 am   have you started on songs forever yet?

     i can't tell you

5.19.17  10:13 am   how can i become your friend irl?

     i don't know

5.19.17  9:43 am   how does it feel having nearly 15% of your views on just one of your videos? How does that inform your creative process going forward?

     all my videos would have a different percent of the views, which ultimately adds up to 100%. i'm not sure if that answers your question

5.19.17  9:42 am   to the person who requested you make a favicon: there are browser extensions that let you choose a favicon for any page (and can include any/all pages on that domain), just google search for your browser + "favicon changer" or "tab edit" and you should find one. so that way they can choose any favicon they wanted to, even for the entire site. and it might help them out if there are other sites they visit without a favicon

     ah, nice
5.19.17  9:35 am   would you ever come to australia? also why didnt you include much of australia in hotewig??? also i love u

5.19.17  9:33 am   For your next music video, will you make it comedic or rather serious? because i love your music style, and i wonder if you'll ever make a "serious" song

     i'm not sure i know how to make the distinction
5.19.17  9:29 am   How much is too much?

5.19.17  9:11 am   when do you think is a good time to capitalize your letters?

     when using acronyms, for example

5.19.17  9:00 am   Why is the world round?

      anything that spins around for millions of years usually becomes round

5.19.17  8:48 am   When is reality getting updated?

     as soon as possible

     I'm tired of the current patch.

5.19.17  8:48 am   Seriously what the hell is regular font?

     whatever font you get when you just start typing and don't change the font

5.19.17  8:22 am   of all the forty-nine us states that do not have settlements named new canaan, why did you pick pennsylvania?

     it just came to me spontaneously. there was never a state-selection for that line. i was on my way to new canaan connecticut, writing a song, and when i wrote the first line and sang it in my head, it came out as 'new canaan pennsylvania.' that's just how it came out. and then i had to move forward with the song accordingly

5.19.17  8:11 am   If you were billwurtz would you still be billwurtz?

     yes

5.19.17  8:11 am   is this the 1st question of the day?

     no

5.19.17  8:08 am   How do you call it, constantinople or istanbul?

     i think it's been istanbul ever since it has been turkish
5.19.17  7:57 am   What is your favourite question asked here so far?

5.19.17  7:41 am   It's hot outside, is there any way to get hotter outside?

     yes!

5.19.17  7:36 am   now that hotewig is done are you ready to bring back the bill wurtz band?

     i can't tell you

5.19.17  7:02 am   what is light?

     i think it's everything
5.19.17  6:51 am   What font do you use?

5.19.17  6:35 am   You wrote that you try to make every video your favourite in the time of making it. You've also said in one of your reality videos (back in 2013 though) that you try not to let perfectionism get the better of you, that "it's not the point". How do you combine making the current video your fave but not "perfect"? Or are these two different things?

     ah, you have to compromise. it's kind of like you have dirt and mud, and someone sets the timer for 10 seconds, and you have to just make the best thing you can, out of the dirt and mud

5.19.17  6:29 am   why are you here?

     where

5.19.17  6:29 am   How do you think living a "normal life" would affect who you are? Or who you were if you had lived that kind of life all the time? I hate to use the word "normal", but in this case I use it to describe life where one has a mediocre job, a relationship, spends freetime with different hobbies such as sports or hanging out with friends. Could you be like that?

     no

5.19.17  6:28 am   is the moon made of cheese

     i don't think so

5.19.17  6:27 am   hey bill, ever considered doing vids and songs for $$$?

     yes and no. (i already am, and am not)

5.19.17  6:19 am   when and how did you realise music is your real passion?

     i don't remember but it has magical powers, so

5.19.17  5:56 am   why is ":0000000" on the hotewig.html page? i hope you know what i mean

     that was the first question reacting to the release of the video

5.19.17  5:42 am   WHATS YOUR FAVORITE IDEA mine is to think creatively

     ah, that's a great idea

5.19.17  5:35 am   when is the future?

     it should be here any minute now

5.19.17  5:32 am   in some of your answers you stated that you do a lot of writing in 2009, out of any year.

     i did much more in 2010, and 2012 and 13. also 11 i think. (i assume you're talking about songwriting)

     did the year 2009 had anything special to you?

5.19.17  5:08 am   How do i fake my own death???

     tell everyone you died!
